ConnectedHomeHeaderBody: A hackathon like no other, gathering people all over the world to simultaneously hack in both physical locations and online.
ConnectedHomeSection1Body: Junction 2020 Connected is a new take on the established concept of a hackathon; participants all over the world can join physical locations hosted by Junction and other organizations, or participate in the event fully online.
ConnectedHomeSection2Body: The local hubs give the concept of a normal online hackathon a twist by increasing the sense of community and making physical interaction possible when needed. Check out your nearest hub or organize one yourself!
